summary: OVER THE PAST TWO WEEKS, THREE (3) LUG NUTS HAVE MYSTERIOUSLY BROKEN ON THE VEHICLE, TWO (2) ON THE LEFT FRONT WHEEL AND ONE (1) ON THE RIGHT REAR WHEEL.  I TOOK THE VEHICLE TO WILSON POWELL DARCAR DEALER IN MARLOW HEIGHTS, MARYLAND, WHERE NEW LUGS WERE INSTALLED. TWO DAYS LATER, THE NEW LUG THAT WAS INSTALLED BROKE. *JB
